name: Ehci
tagline: Enhanced human computer interface through webcam image processing library.
body:
EHCI can be used as open source head tracking library.

[Originally hosted here](https://code.google.com/p/ehci/)

## Showcase:

[![EHCI demo](http://db.tt/UbxBmdPI)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=BovphSjw_tI)
